entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 9:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
